snippet: Three people were killed and at least 60 wounded, a day after a grenade attack at a bus stop in the coastal city of Mombasa killed four people.
abstract: Three people are killed and at least 60 wounded when two homemade bombs explode on buses in Nairobi, Kenya.
lead_paragraph: Three people were killed and at least 60 wounded, a day after a grenade attack at a bus stop in the coastal city of Mombasa killed four people.

headline.main: Bombs Explode on Two Buses Packed With Kenya Commuters
headline.print_headline: Bombs Explode on Two Buses Packed With Kenya Commuters
